rule: Each description must be longer than eighty words in length.
input: An extensive paragraph that goes into great length describing every minor detail of the scene, ensuring that the total word count surpasses the eighty-word threshold, thereby violating the input specification of not exceeding eighty words.
coverage: It seems like the provided input describes the structure of a paragraph rather than detailing a specific scene. To create an effective AI photo prompt, please provide a description of the scene you have in mind, including details about the subjects, setting, time of day, lighting, and the desired emotional atmosphere. This will allow me to transform your description into a concise, under-eighty-word prompt following the specified guidelines.
validityText:
The input exceeds the maximum allowed word count of eighty words, thereby violating the input specification.
